dmca.title: [EV1-C1042297B] Notice of copyright infringement
dmca.body:
From: abuse@theplanet.com Subject: [EV1-C1042297B] Notice of copyright infringement Reference: [EV1-C1042297B] For your review. Thank you, Policy Enforcement The Planet Internet Services, Inc. http://www.theplanet.com/legal/ ==== Original Message ==== 1. Notice of copyright infringement Added by system at Wednesday, Sep 20 2006 03:53 pm X-MailFrom: randygainer@dwt.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [70.87.6.111] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Wed Sep 20 15:53:24 2006 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Wed, 20 Sep 2006 15:52:17 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Wed, 20 Sep 2006 15:52:17 -0500 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from randygainer@dwt.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1GQ93I-00005x-Ox; Wed, 20 Sep 2006 15:52:17 -0500 Received: from exprod5og50.obsmtp.com ([64.18.0.141]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from randygainer@dwt.com) with smtp (Exim) id 1GQ91y-0001Sx-Ij; Wed, 20 Sep 2006 15:52:10 -0500 Received: from source ([67.105.193.190]) by exprod5ob50.postini.com ([64.18.4.12]) with SMTP; Wed, 20 Sep 2006 13:50:45 PDT Received: from seaex02.DWT.COM ([10.0.16.39]) by seaex01.DWT.COM with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Wed, 20 Sep 2006 13:50:44 -0700 Content-class: urn:content-classes:message MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary="----_=_NextPart_001_01C6DCF6.70778E11" X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft Exchange V6.5.7226.0 Subject: Notice of copyright infringement Date: Wed, 20 Sep 2006 13:50:42 -0700 Message-ID: <22B6706F20F2044D9F88AE1F3306D058020B1721@seaex02.DWT.COM> X-MS-Has-Attach: yes X-MS-TNEF-Correlator: Thread-Topic: Notice of copyright infringement Thread-Index: Acbc9m+3+nQXu0oKSJSrXjP3wMd8iQ== From: "Gainer, Randy" To: , Cc: "Carolan, Duffy" X-OriginalArrivalTime: 20 Sep 2006 20:50:44.0205 (UTC) FILETIME=[70F8B1D0:01C6DCF6] X-imss-version: 2.030 X-imss-result: Passed X-imss-scores: Clean:58.32550 C:2 M:3 S:5 R:5 X-imss-settings: Baseline:1 C:1 M:1 S:1 R:1 (0.0000 0.0000) Received-SPF: none (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: 64.18.0.141 is neither permitted nor denied by domain of dwt.com) client-ip=64.18.0.141; envelope-from=randygainer@dwt.com; helo=exprod5og50.obsmtp.com; (multipart/mixed) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) ThePlanet.com Internet Service, Inc. 1333 N. Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110 Dallas, TX 75207 This firm represents ANG Newspapers, publishers of the Oakland Tribune and InsideBayArea.com, a daily newspaper of general circulation in California and its Internet version. We write because it has come to our attention that the website www.pornbestdirectory.com, for which you are a "service provider" as defined in 17 U.S.C. section 512(k)(1)(B), is infringing on the copyrights of ANG Newspapers and InsideBayArea.com, entities owned by MediaNews Group, Inc. Specifically, substantial portions of original content by the Oakland Tribune in its theatre review section of its daily paper have been copied verbatim and without permission on the "pornbestdirectory" website, which is hosted on one of your servers. See http://www.pornbestdirectory.com/porn-news-1189.html and compare the text in the attached file, which was previously posted at http://www.insidebayarea.com/search/ci_4080929. Moreover, the names of ANG reporters are being used as though they were the original authors of content for the "pornbestdirectory" website. This improper, unauthorized commercial use of their names creates a false impression that they work for or endorse the "pornbestdirectory" website. They do not and this false impression is actionable under many theories of tort law. Please cease and desist from permitting your servers to be used by any hosting company or website owner to display copies of any portion of ANG or InsideBayArea.com's content. Please immediately take down or disable that section of the "pornbestdirectory" website referenced above that contains the original content of ANG Newspapers and InsideBayArea.com. If you do not immediately take down or disable this page/portion of the "pornbestdirectory" website, please be advised that ANG Newspapers will do everything it can to enforce its rights in its original copyrighted content. Please also acknowledge receipt of this email by responding and confirming that the immediate action requested is underway. ANG Newspapers, InsideBayArea.com, and I obviously a good faith belief that use of the above-described copyrighted material is unauthorized and unlawful. I declare under the penalty of perjury that I am authorized to act on behalf of the owners of the copyrighted material. Please contact me if you have any questions. Randy Gainer | Davis Wright Tremaine LLP 1501 4th Avenue, Suite 2600 | Seattle, WA 98101 Tel: (206) 628-7660 | Fax: (206) 903-3760 | Mobile: (206) 953-0127 Email: randygainer@dwt.com | Website: www.dwt.com Bio: www.dwt.com/lawdir/attorneys/GainerRandy.cfm Anchorage | Bellevue | Los Angeles | New York | Portland | San Francisco | Seattle | Washington, D.C. | Shanghai <> MIME element (text/html) Notice of copyright infringement

ThePlanet.com Internet Service, Inc.
1333 N. Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110
Dallas, TX  75207

This firm represents ANG Newspapers, publishers of the Oakland Tribune and InsideBayArea.com, a daily newspaper of general circulation in California and its Internet version.  We write because it has come to our attention that the website www.pornbestdirectory.com, for which you are a "service provider" as defined in 17 U.S.C. section 512(k)(1)(B), is infringing on the copyrights of ANG Newspapers and InsideBayArea.com, entities owned by MediaNews Group, Inc.  Specifically, substantial portions of original content by the Oakland Tribune in its theatre review section of its daily paper have been copied verbatim and without permission on the "pornbestdirectory" website, which is hosted on one of your servers.  See http://www.pornbestdirectory.com/porn-news-1189.html and compare the text in the attached file, which was previously posted at http://www.insidebayarea.com/search/ci_4080929.  Moreover, the names of ANG reporters are being used as though they were the original authors of content for the "pornbestdirectory" website.  This improper, unauthorized commercial use of their names creates a false impression that they work for or endorse the "pornbestdirectory" website.  They do not and this false impression is actionable under many theories of tort law. 

Please cease and desist from permitting your servers to be used by any hosting company or website owner to display copies of any portion of ANG or InsideBayArea.com's content.  Please immediately take down or disable that section of the "pornbestdirectory" website referenced above that contains the original content of ANG Newspapers and InsideBayArea.com.  If you do not immediately take down or disable this page/portion of the "pornbestdirectory" website, please be advised that ANG Newspapers will do everything it can to enforce its rights in its original copyrighted content.  Please also acknowledge receipt of this email by responding and confirming that the immediate action requested is underway.

ANG Newspapers, InsideBayArea.com, and I obviously a good faith belief that use of the above-described copyrighted material is unauthorized and unlawful.  I declare under the penalty of perjury that I am authorized to act on behalf of the owners of the copyrighted material.

Please contact me if you have any questions. 

Randy Gainer | Davis Wright Tremaine LLP
1501 4th Avenue, Suite 2600 | Seattle, WA 98101
